page.title: 11HOME LIFE 2.
page.content: During the past 6 years the Standard of Living has been forced down. Food tends to be basic - bread, cereal, potato (usually chips), and egg or sausage or burgers or beans. Little fresh meat is bought and poultry has replaced the Sunday joint. Recreation centres round the TV and most homes have a video. Family Â£outings' revolve round:- the weekly shopping, visits to the Seasonal "Fairs" held in the schools and halls, or to Beacon Park. Special Â£outings' centre round soccer, the local club, or the local dances held in the schools or community Centres. Very few people are able to afford a holiday away from home so day trips are again in vogue. Many children never leave the area except for School Visits.
